sentences.en: About 3 years ago, l caught a few sneaky thieves for them.
sentences.cn: 大概在3年前, 我帮他们抓了一些鬼祟的贼.

sentences.en: Criminal are really sneaky these years.
sentences.cn: 这年头罪犯还真是狡猾.

sentences.en: Don't you think that's a little bIt'sneaky?
sentences.cn: 你不觉得这样做不那么正大光明 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is lethal, silent, and sneaky.
His sneaky behavior aroused our suspicion.
sentences.cn: 你鬼祟的行为令我们生疑.

sentences.en: I've got a sneaky feeling LOVE actually is all around.
sentences.cn: 我有种强烈的感觉:爱,其实是无处不在的.

sentences.en: I've never seen Girogio behave in such an awkward , sneaky manner.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过乔治的行为举止会如此粗劣 、 卑怯.

sentences.en: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business.
sentences.cn: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

sentences.en: It's primitive, but it's fair And a lot less sneaky.
sentences.cn: 那样很原始, 但也公平.还少了很多鬼鬼祟祟的东西.

sentences.en: Leslie: Squogre. The sneaky foot soldiers of the Dark Master.
sentences.cn: 松鼠怪. 黑暗魔王鬼鬼祟祟的小兵.
这种把戏可不够光明正大！

sentences.en: The sneaky foot soldiers of the Dark Master.
sentences.cn: 黑暗魔王鬼鬼祟祟的小兵.

sentences.en: This is actually a complement. A sly dog is clever and sneaky.
sentences.cn: 这是一句赞扬的话,指人很精明,狡猾. 也指暗中寻欢的人,暗地里偷鸡摸狗的人.

sentences.en: This sneaky girl was disliked by the rest of the class.
sentences.cn: 全班同学都不喜欢这个鬼头鬼脑的女同学.
你们没结婚的人太不老实.

words.tran_cn: 鬼鬼祟祟的；私下的；卑鄙的
鬼鬼祟祟的人；偷偷摸摸的行为；告密者
运动鞋；卑鄙者；鬼鬼祟祟做事的人
溜；鬼鬼祟祟做事；向老师打小报告
鬼鬼祟祟的；暗中的，卑鄙的

trans.tran_en: doing things in a secret and often dishonest or unfair way
